duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to the development of agile platforms for software and data-driven products and services.
Ensure performance and reliability are key aspects of the software and services engineered.
Utilize simulation and automation techniques for solution scalability and adaptability.
Model performance to optimize solutions for scalability and replication.
Test and deploy IoT solutions and services, ensuring seamless functionality.
Create and maintain technical documentation for software, services, and IoT devices.
Troubleshoot IoT devices to diagnose and resolve technical issues.
Read and understand source code to contribute to software development and engineering.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and ensure successful software and IoT solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
